did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Papers of president of Duce Aeronautical Research (Baltimore, Maryland). Includes typescript "Alphabetical Index of Approved Aircraft"; manuscript drafts of articles on pilot safety, paratroop devices, air races, Boeing XB-47 Stratojet, the future of jet pilots; and miscellaneous notes.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the G. Grahame Duce Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: G. Grahame Duce Papers, Ms1987-005- Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The G. Grahame Duce Papers were donated to Special Collections in 1987.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement and description of the G. Grahame Duce Papers began in October, 2005 and was completed in October, 2005.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: G. Grahame Duce was President of Duce Aeronautical Research, located at 2100 Mount Royal Ter. Apt. 6, Baltimore 17, Maryland.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains the papers of G. Grahame Duce, President of Duce Aeronautical Research in Baltimore, Maryland. Included within the collection are various airplane notes and characteristics from 1920 to 1939, an approved aircraft index from 1947, and manuscript drafts of articles, some from 1947, discussing new paratroop devices, the fastest long-ranger, the Martin XB-48, the building of XB-48, airlines in the red, pilot judgment, air races, the Boeing XB-47, the jet pilot, and the future of jet planes.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The papers are divided into twelve folders and are arranged in a roughly chronological order.
